fields.name: Ramen Bowl
fields.description: These bowls are handmade from iron-red earthenware clay. Each piece is unique and different in some way. Made-to-order pieces take roughly 1-2 weeks to complete. Remember that we make each piece from start to finish, so please allow plenty of time for each piece to be made properly. Handmade things take time. Please message me which color you would like.
fields.color: Cobalt blue, Smoke blue, Turquoise, Ruby Red, Indigo, Desert green, Teal, Moss, Speckled white, and Matte black
fields.size: 8 inches in diameter and 3 inches tall

fields.name: The Mug
fields.description: This mug holds approximately 10-12oz, stands up straight, and is ready for daily use. Each mug will be glazed in our classic kjp speckled white with a raw, unglazed band around its belly. You choose the accent color from our seasonal favorites, please message me with what color you would like.
fields.color: Cobalt blue, Smoke blue, Turquoise, Ruby Red, Indigo, Desert green, Teal, Moss, Speckled white, and Matte black

fields.name: Ceramic Flower Tiles
fields.description: This (12) pc set of ceramic flower tiles contains a variety of bright and colorful flowers in various shapes and sizes. You will randomly receive (3) flowers in each of the four colors. If you'd prefer specific flowers in specific colors please message me and I'd be happy to create a custom order for you. These tiles would be perfect additions to your mosaic or arts and craft project. You can use them to embellish and enhance a picture frame, mirror, bird house, flowerpot, sign, etc. or use as jewelry or button cabochons. You could even attach a magnet to their backs to give your work locker or refrigerator a pop of color - so many possibilities!
fields.color: Bright blue, orange, yellow and purple
fields.size: These flower tiles range in size between the smallest at approx 1/2 x 1/2 x 1/4 to the largest at approx 1 1/8 inch x 1 1/8 inch x 1/4 inch. As this is a variety set, flower sizes will vary with some tiles measuring 1/8 inch in depth.

fields.name: Concrete Chess Set
fields.description: If you're a chess collector or appreciate unique and stylish decor, then this concrete chess set is a must-have. The board features a polished, smooth surface and distinctive grooved squares that make it a standout piece that is sure to impress. At approximately 3.5kg, it is sturdy enough to withstand even the most intense chess matches, and its unique design sets it apart from traditional chess boards. Our handmade concrete chess pieces are one-of-a-kind, each individually crafted with care and attention to detail. The pieces are polished to a smooth finish, making them a pleasure to handle during gameplay. They are also backed with cork to protect your chess board and provide a satisfying tactical feel while playing. These pieces are not only functional but also make a beautiful addition to any chess set collection. With their unique handmade quality, no two sets are exactly alike.
fields.size: The chess board is 11.5 by 11.5 and is 3/4 inches thick

fields.name: Purple Maple Chess Set
fields.description: Beautiful Purple Heart and Maple chess board with a Purple Heart border and Maple splines accenting the corners.
fields.size: The sizes available are 1.5 squares and border for total dimension of 15x15 or 2.0 squares and border for total dimension of 20x20

fields.name: Zebra Wood Comfort Bird
fields.description: This bird was carved out of Zebrawood, a West African hardwood. The wood is not colored or stained, but rather is finished with multiple coats of oil and varnish that bring out the natural beauty of the wood. In time the oils from your fingers and palms will add to the patina of the wood.
fields.color: The Zebrawood heartwood is a light brown or cream color with dark blackish brown streaks vaguely resembling a zebras stripes.

fields.name: Three Little Birds
fields.description: Three Little Birds Oak Wooden Sculpture Set‚Äîwhere art meets melody in a charming display of inspiration. This delightful trio pays homage to the timeless lyrics of Bob Marley and the Wailers' Three Little Birds, infusing your space with a touch of musical magic.

fields.name: Wooden Black Rabbit
fields.description:
2023, it is the Year of the Black Rabbit.
Rabbits are symbolized prosperity, abundance, good luck, and fertility.

This Rabbit would be a great unisex present for your friend, husband, colleague, girlfriend, or parents for different occasions, such as Birthday, Housewarmings, Anniversary, Father's Day, Christmas, Independence Day, New Year's, Thanksgiving, and any event: Birthday, Anniversary, Baptism, Graduation, Housewarming, Wedding, Christmas, Father`s Day, New Year`s, Thanksgiving
You could complete your interior in a Classic or Scandinavian style, you can also decorate a space in a Minimalist or Bohemian style with this product.

fields.name: Wooden Cat Statue
fields.description:
The cat is a symbol of independence, cunning, curiosity, ingenuity and femininity. This interior item will fit to home, apartment, or office.
This stylish and unique piece is here to help you complete your interior in a Classic or Scandinavian style, you can also decorate a space in a Minimalist or Bohemian style with this product.
Featuring a universal brown or black finish, this statue will make a great addition to any type of decor.
Place it atop your desk, bookshelf, mantle, end table, or anywhere you prefer to show off your love for these incredible and majestic creature.

Due to the handmade nature of this product and the settings of your screen, the color of a finish can have a difference from the photo.

fields.name: Small Bowls

The KJ Pottery small bowl is the do-all of cute and small and functional. These bowls are prefect for sauces, ice cream, cooking prep, ring dish, you name it!

This listing is for (3) bowls

These little bowls are dishwasher, microwave, and oven safe.

fields.name: Mosaic Blossom Flower Tiles
fields.description:
These are a mixed color pack , but if you would prefer to choose which colors then please just contact me.
I cut my tiles from only high quality clay and twice kiln fire. The second firing is to a very high temperature making them more durable and able to withstand outdoor elements although care should be taken in extreme conditions
The tiles are glazed so no problem with grouting
Please have a look at my other items for more specialist tiles e.g flowers, various leaves, numbers and letters. if you cannot find exactly what you are looking for then please contact me as I may be able to help.

14 black with white centres daisy style flowers
Ceramic tiles perfect for adding a unique touch to your mosaic or similar project
I cut my tiles from high quality clay and twice kiln fire to very high temperatures so they are suitable for out doors (although care should be taken in extreme conditions)

fields.name: Soaps For Men Gift Box
fields.description:
Give a man something he can actually use with these fragrant natural soap bars. Each bar is a nice 3.5 ounce rustic cut bar. Each bar is labeled and neatly packed in a kraft recyclable gift box. In one gift box you get four (4) soaps.

This gift box will include top-selling soaps (mostly what is pictured) that men love and have bought again and again. If you have a special request for scents, please leave a note during checkout or message us. The list below are scents we offer, however we can not guarantee every scent is always available at the time of order. Some soaps have exfoliates.

fields.name: Soaps For Women Gift Box
fields.description: All-natural handmade soaps are the perfect gift idea for family and friends. It is a gift that anyone can use no matter their age. This gift box will include your choice of four or six bars of top selling variety scented soaps.
fields.material: Quality rich shea butter, coconut oil, olive oil, essential oils

fields.name: Lavender Soap
fields.description: Lavender soap is my second favorite of all the soaps we create here at SheaGarden. In fact, lavender oil is the only essential oil that I make myself with lavender plants that I grow. This Lavender Handmade Soap has a delicate and unmistakable scent that all lovers of the Mediterranean Lavandula plant will enjoy. The floral layers of this earthy scent has a delightful presence that will intrigue your sense of smell. If you do not like the natural (none synthetic) scent of lavender, then you may want to skip this soap. If you are looking for the real thing however, you may want to add this to your cart.
fields.material: lavender oil, essential oil, distilled water, sodium hydroxide, olive oil, coconut oil, shea butter

fields.name: Lemongrass Soap
fields.description: This handmade soap bar has a very pleasant herbal lemon scent, with undertones of ginger root spice. The creamy lather and refreshing scent is one of the most pleasing cleansers we have to offer. No color or exfoliates are added. All natural and rustic.
fields.material: lemongrass oil, ginger root oil, essential oil, distilled water, sodium hydroxide, olive oil, coconut oil, shea butter

fields.name: Summer Fruit Soap
fields.description: Take a walk in the garden and pick some raspberries and peaches, mix it with a mild floral blend and you have the perfect soap bar! Robust and delightful, the perfect decoration for your bathroom or kitchen. Rich lather, healthy for you whole body. Use as hand or body soap.
fields.material: fruit fragrance oil, essential oil, distilled water, sodium hydroxide, olive oil, coconut oil, shea butter

fields.name: Turmeric & Shea Butter Night Cream
fields.description:
Restore a sense of calm with our deeply nourishing + balancing night cream. Our highly concentrated facial moisturizer was created to calm even the fussiest of skin. Formulated with skin-nourishing oils, and calming botanicals, these plant proteins work in harmony over time to deliver beautiful, radiant skin.

Our night cream begins by infusing a house made herbal blend in silky smooth oils using a double extraction process. This process allows us to extract as much of the plant's renewal properties as possible. To those oils we have added in additional skin-loving superstars, such as Rose Hydrosol and Shea Nilotica Butter. Essential oils of Frankincense, Helichrysum, Roman Chamomile and Rose Geranium were also added to this formula for their deeply nourishing and restorative properties.
fields.material: Ingredients: Grapeseed Oil infused with: Plantain, Comfrey, White Willow Bark, Yarrow & Calendula, Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil, Rose Hydrosol, Aloe Vera, Sea Buckthorn Extract, Shea Nilotica Butter, Beeswax, Lanolin, Turmeric Extract, Vitamin E Oil, Essential Oils of: Rose Geranium, Roman Chamomile, Frankincense, Lavender and Helichrysum

fields.name: Black Drawing Salve
fields.description: Throughout history, folk methods have been utilized to unlock the natural potential of plants. Bentonite and Activated Charcoal are known for their drawing properties, so we've added a healthy dose of each and a bevy of skin loving herbs for this powerful compound. Our handmade Black Drawing Salve combines the power of nourishing oils and carefully selected botanicals to offer a potent herbal formula. Our salve begins with a double infusion process that allows us to extract much more of the amazing properties of each herb used. Following traditional folk methods, this salve is prepared with love + intention using a blend of high quality oils.
fields.material: Ingredients: Avocado Oil infused with: Chickweed, Yarrow, Plantain, Comfrey, St. John's Wort, Calendula and Lavender, Castor Oil, Beeswax, Bentonite Clay, Activated Charcoal, Lavender Absolute, Tea Tree Essential Oil

fields.name: Rosemary Hair Oil
fields.description:
The Argan + Rosemary Mega Growth Elixir is a potent blend of high quality, nourishing herbs and oils. Our nutrient-dense growth oil is suitable for ALL hair types and begins with a house made blend of Horsetail, Nettle, Burdock Root, Hibiscus, Red Clover Tops, Oat Straw, Calendula, Elderberry, Licorice Root, Dandelion Root and Marshmallow Root. Each herb in this blend was selected with total hair + scalp care in mind.

This botanical blend is then infused into nourishing oils of Argan Oil, Jojoba Oil, Macadamia Nut Oil, Coconut Oil and Castor oil in a multi-day, double infusion process that helps extract as much of the purported benefits of each herb as possible. This is truly a labor of love and an exquisite oil to add to your self care ritual.

üúÉ Suggested Use: Apply directly to the scalp and gently massage for 2-3 minutes. Apply a few extra drops to the length of your hair, and gently work the product down the entire hair shaft. - Use 3-4 times per week. A little goes a long way!

üúÉ This hair oil can also be used to detangle + soften, as a pre shampoo treatment, as a luxurious hot oil treatment, and can be added to store bought conditioners.
fields.material: Ingredients: Argan Oil, Macadamia Nut Oil, Organic Jojoba Oil infused with: Horsetail, Nettle, Burdock Root, Hibiscus, Red Clover Tops, Oat Straw, Calendula, Elderberry, Licorice Root, Dandelion Root, Marshmallow Root, Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil, Castor Oil, Rosemary Essential Oil, Ylang Ylang Essential Oil, Vitamin E Oil

fields.name: Ecologies Card Game
fields.description:
Create balanced ecologies while trying to unbalance opponents.

In ECOLOGIES, you build and maintain food webs in diverse biomes around the world. Each biome has a different ecology, and gives unique rewards when it is healthy and balanced. But watch out, your opponents may decide it's easier to disturb and degrade your ecosystems than nurture their own. In this hectic environment, you must choose how best to protect and care for your ecologies.

Designed by a biology teacher, the game includes 77 unique organisms, 7 biomes, and beautiful vintage Victorian art. (108 cards total)

Players: 1-6
Ages: 12+ (8+ with included simplified rules)
Time: 60-90 minutes
Game Modes: Standard, Simplified, Single Player

The goal is to build healthy food webs in different biomes. If you create a healthy ecology you are rewarded with the perks and powers of that biome. Each organism card lists what it eats and what it‚Äôs eaten by. Cards are arranged with plants on the bottom, predators on top. There is a trade mechanic similar to Catan where players trade with others based on what their individual needs are. It is a race to get 12 victory points and different organisms give different points. There are biotic/abiotic factor cards that can affect opponents and different strategies such as focusing on one biome, going for perks and bonuses, or disrupting other ecologies.

The game takes inspiration from titles like Settlers of Catan, Agricola, and Dominion. The gameplay is rooted in authentic science, as it is used in the classroom to teach real concepts to biology students. While it is scientific enough for the classroom, it is also strategic enough for any game night.

fields.name: Drylands Board Game
fields.description:
Our new game ‚ÄúDrylands‚Äù is now available!

Set in Africa‚Äôs Sahel region, the game uses Africa‚Äôs ‚ÄúGreat Green Wall‚Äù as its backdrop.

The Great Green Wall is a multinational project aimed at planting a continuous belt of trees across Africa to stop the spread of desertification.

Drylands are fragile ecosystems where deserts border savanna and/or forest biomes. These places can easily be degraded into desert like conditions or nurtured to be greener and more productive. It depends on how the land is managed.

In this two player game the desert player competes with the forest player to decide the outcome of a small section of drylands.

The gameplay and strategy is abstract, reminiscent of Othello, Go, or Reversi, where the objective is to flip opponent tiles.

Each turn players can ‚Äúgrow‚Äù by placing a new tile next to their established tiles, or they can ‚Äúleap‚Äù using an existing tile to move to a location farther away.

Whenever you place one of your tiles next to opponent tiles, either through growing or leaping, those opponent tiles flip and become yours.

This is made slightly more complicated by one-way barrier tiles (rivers and mountains) that block the path of players. Forest tiles can leap over rivers, but not mountains. Desert tiles can leap over mountains, but not rivers.

A game that‚Äôs easy to learn but hard to master, it is suitable for a wide range of ages, from 5 to 105.

In the box is a large quad fold game board (14.5"x14.5") and five rigid tile sheets (20 tiles per sheet = 100 tiles total) You actually only need 4 tile sheets to play the game, but we included an extra sheet of tiles because we know small pieces are easy to lose and we wanted players to have plenty of extra tiles just in case.
fields.size: In the box is a large quad fold game board (14.5"x14.5") and five rigid tile sheets (20 tiles per sheet = 100 tiles total)

fields.name: 1000 Piece Puzzle "Hidden Habitat"
fields.description:
Our 1000 piece ‚ÄúHidden Habitat‚Äù puzzle features the same vintage art used in our ‚ÄúEcologies: Hidden Habitats‚Äù card game. It showcases a detailed intertidal scene full of diverse marine organisms.

This puzzle is very large, measuring 27.6 inches by 19.7 inches when finished.

We also use an anti-glare matte lamination process for the surface finishing to improve durability and cut out the shine of normal gloss varnish, making it easier to see the fine details.

The inner box features bonus biological facts about different marine animals, along with detailed art.

The thick cardboard pieces have a white backing and fit together well.

* Warning: small parts. Not for children under 3 or any individuals who have a tendency to place inedible objects in their mouths.
fields.size: * Warning: small parts. Not for children under 3 or any individuals who have a tendency to place inedible objects in their mouths.

fields.name: Wooden Bear
fields.description:
üêª Bears symbolize strength, courage, family, and leadership. This wooden bear sculpture embodies these qualities, serving as a reminder of the power and majesty of nature.

üå≤ Crafted from premium oak wood and finished in brown and black color, this bear sculpture captures the essence of the wilderness. It exudes an air of strength and dignity, celebrating the beauty found in the natural world.

üè† Designed to seamlessly complement various interior styles, from modern to rustic. Its rich black hue creates a captivating contrast that draws the eye, making it an ideal addition to any space.

üéÅ An exquisite present for those who appreciate the symbolism of bears‚Äîstrength, courage, and leadership. Perfect for birthdays, housewarmings, or any occasion that warrants a touch of artistic beauty.

‚ú®Every detail is meticulously handcrafted, showcasing our commitment to producing pieces of unparalleled quality. Our dedication to eco-friendly practices extends to our use of organic packaging.

Please message me which color you would like

fields.name: Herb Garden Trio
fields.description:
Herb Garden Trio - Mason Jar Hydroponic Kit Set (Rosemary, Lavender, Oregano)

Herb Garden Trio Includes:
‚úì 1 Rosemary mason jar hydroponic kit
‚úì 1 Lavender mason jar hydroponic kit
‚úì 1 Oregano mason jar hydroponic kit

Low Maintenance
This self-watering growing kit requires very low daily maintenance. The wick will pull water from the jar to the plant root which ensures the plant takes enough water it needs. No need to water frequently. Just refill the jar when there is not much water left.

Beautiful and Safe Home Decor
This artistic mason jar Herb set can lighten up any home. You can put it on your windowsill, your kitchen counter or anywhere you like. All the seeds are heirloom seeds. We assure you that you can purchase with confidence for you and your loved ones.

Herb Day Everyday
You can plant and have easy access to your favorite herb at home with this kit. Nothing is more exciting than having your own home grown fresh herbs every day. These plant herbs will surely add flavor to your dishes and more color to your home.

Great Gardening Gift
This herb garden trio is a perfect gift for anyone: cooking enthusiasts, aspiring gardeners, and even those who just want to grow something.

fields.name: Mason Jar Hydroponic Kit - Single
fields.description:
Self-watering hydroponic plant kit .

Kit Includes:
‚úì 1 32oz mason jar
‚úì 1 net pot with wick
‚úì 1 pre-seeded growing plug with non-GMO Basil seeds

Quick Start
‚úì Remove the lid ring and the net pot from the mason jar.
‚úì Add 2 cups (16oz) of water to the jar.
‚úì Place the net pot and the lid ring back to its place.
‚úì Remove the plug cover in 7 days or when the seeds begin to sprout.

Low Maintenance
This self-watering growing kit requires very low daily maintenance. The wick will pull water from the jar to the plant root which ensures the plant takes enough water it needs. No need to water frequently. Just refill the jar when there is not much water left.

fields.name: Magnesium Butter
fields.description:
üåø Our 100% Natural Magnesium Butter is crafted using Magnesium from the ancient Zechstein Seabed along with cold pressed butter and oils.

Did you know Magnesium is part of over 300 biochemical reactions in the body?
This is why low magnesium levels are linked to many ailments, our body needs it!

This Magnesium Lotion is packaged in Amber Glass Jars, NOT plastic.

Use just like you would any other lotion. Choose ‚ÄúLavender Scent‚Äù to make a perfect bedtime lotion!

üåøCold Pressed, Unrefined Mango Butter is lighter than Shea Butter while still providing skin hydration and help fight damage.
üåøCold Pressed, Unrefined Grape Seed Oil absorbs quickly and moisturizes without clogging pores.
üåøMagnesium Flakes from the Ancient Zechstein Seabed
üåøCold Pressed Babassu Oil is packed with fatty acids that nourish and soften skin.

All of our products are Made to Order so you never have to worry about receiving a product that isn‚Äôt fresh.

Product is for external use only.

Not sure if Magnesium Lotion is for you? Check out our Ancient Trio Bath Salt Soak or Ancient Magnesium Oil!

At Purity Tree, natural means NATURAL!
We believe pure, quality products should be accessible and as affordable as possible.

All of our products are free of chemicals, GMO‚Äôs, and additives.

Please feel free to contact us anytime with any questions or concerns.

Orders are crafted and shipped within three business days.
Thank you for supporting small business!
fields.material: Raw Mango Butter, Cold Pressed Grapeseed Oil, Magnesium Flakes, Cold Pressed Babassu Oil, Spring Water

fields.name: Magnesium Oil Spray
fields.description:
üåø Our 100% Natural Magnesium Oil Spray is crafted using Magnesium from the ancient Zechstein Seabed. And it‚Äôs easy to use!

*By definition, salts are an inorganic compound. This listing may not feature the phrase ‚ÄúOrganic Magnesium Oil‚Äù, however you can rest assured that no chemicals are used at any point during the extraction process.*

Did you know Magnesium is part of over 300 biochemical reactions in the body?
This is why low magnesium levels are linked to many ailments, our body needs it!

This Magnesium Spray is packaged in Amber Glass Bottles, NOT plastic.
These bottles provide a fine mist of Topical Magnesium for optimal coverage.

To use, simply spray then rinse after 20-30 minutes (if necessary to prevent dry skin).

All of our products are Made to Order so you never have to worry about receiving a product that isn‚Äôt fresh.

Original Finish is recommended for those who are new to transdermal magnesium or want a ‚Äúlighter touch‚Äù.

Product is for external use only.

fields.name: Natural Bath Salts

Available as Bulk Bath Salts in a Jar or resealable pouch.

üåøMagnesium sourced from the ancient Zechstein Seabed absorb better than Epsom Salt. This is due to its molecular structure since, unlike Epsom Salt, it isn‚Äôt a sulfate.
üåø Dead Sea Salt & Pink Himalayan Salt also do wonders for the skin and contain over 80 trace minerals!

If you order a set and would like a variety, simply let us know using the ‚ÄúPersonalization‚Äù section and consider it done!

Natural mean NATURAL!
NO Chemicals

Simply pure, quality ingredients from trusted sources.

fields.name: Animal Crochet Rattle
fields.description:
Celebrate the arrival of your little one with our heartwarming personalized baby rattles. Thoughtfully designed, each rattle features a delightful crochet exterior and a gentle bell inside that produces a pleasant sound with every shake. Adding a personal touch, you can customize the rattle with your baby's name, creating a cherished keepsake that will be treasured for years to come.

Our personalized baby rattles are the perfect gift choice for baby showers or to welcome a newborn into the world. Beyond their adorable appearance, these rattles play a meaningful role in your baby's early development. The soft texture, soothing sound, and easy-to-grasp design provide endless delight, making them an ideal companion for your little one's joyous moments of exploration and play. Gift your bundle of joy a symbol of love with our personalized baby rattles, capturing the essence of this special time in their life.

Please message us and let us know the name of the baby and the animal you would like...
Deer
Giraffe
Lion
Hippo
Koala Bear
Bunny Grey
Bunny Blue
Bunny White

fields.name: Baby Bamboo Plate With Spoon
fields.description:
Our Personalized Baby Plate Set are designed for little ones who are learning the art of self-feeding. Crafted with high-quality bamboo and food-grade silicone, this personalized plate set ensures safety, durability, and effortless cleaning.

With convenient dividers and a secure suction base, it keeps food neatly organized and in place, making mealtimes a breeze. The set includes a wooden spoon, ergonomically designed for easy grip and to stay in place while your child explores their newfound independence.

Make mealtime cute, fun, and exclusive with this customizable baby and toddler dining set. It's the perfect combination of functionality, style, and joy, ensuring a delightful feeding experience for both parent and child.

Product Features:

üç± Smart Design: With three compartments and raised edges, our divided plate keeps food separate and minimizes spills, encouraging self-feeding.

üç± Eco-Friendly & Child-Safe: Our bamboo dinner plate prioritizes sustainability and safety, free from harmful chemicals for worry-free dining.

üç± Personalized Charm: Customize the plate with an icon or design of your choice, along with your child's name, creating a special keepsake or thoughtful gift.

üç± Perfect for Toddlers & Kids: Crafted for durability and practicality, this set suits children of all ages, ensuring enjoyable and hassle-free mealtimes.
fields.color: Blue, Grey, White, Yellow, Pink. Please message us which color you would like

fields.name: Custom Baby Sweater
fields.description:
Welcome to our store!
Step into the world of personalized baby sweaters! Each sweater is meticulously hand embroidered with your child's name in cursive on the chest or back. We offer your choice of chunky or extra chunky yarns to make each sweater unique.

Each one-of-a-kind heirloom is customized and hand-embroidered on a high-quality, super soft, 100% cotton, oversized sweater (truly handmade by you!)! !!! Every stitch is a labor of love.

Our personalized sweaters make extraordinary gifts, perfect for baby welcome parties, delightful holiday surprises, joyous birthday celebrations, heartwarming group photos, precious milestone moments, or a unique way to say "Congratulations!" ! Impress the new mom or mom-to-be.

Customized Details:


Please be sure to provide all necessary personalization details accurately. If there are any additional questions or important information that has not been submitted, we will contact you prior to the start of labor. If we do not respond within a week of receiving the information, unfortunately, we may need to cancel the order. Price will vary depending on size

fields.name: Aerial Dancer Mobile
fields.description:
A touch of lightness and colour in your home.
Suspension, Hanging Mobile.
A flight that invites you to relax, to dream.
The dancers, made of silk paper and cardboard, are so light that they strart to move with the smallest draught.

Warning: This is a decorative mobile. Babies should not have them in their mouth. The silk paper might fade.

Each dancer is around 15cm.
The wooden support measures around 30cm each stick.

This mobile soothes babies as well as adults. It shall decorate any room of your home.

fields.name: Duo Modern Hanging Bird Feeder
fields.description:
Divided down the middle by the roof structure, each of the two separate sides holds a perforated aluminum screen for bird seed. The screens simply rest on the two stainless steel rods which are inserted through the piece. These rods also serve as perches for birds, along with two others of different lengths. The Longest is 22" wide.

The pieces are designed to hang by twin ropes of galvanized steel wire, approximately 20" long. Each of these support ropes are designed to rest under the angle of the two bent roofs, coming together at the top in two loops.

These pieces are each treated with spray primer and enamel. Although they are pictured here in only select colors, they can be easily finished in any color you'd prefer.
fields.size: The "Duo" series of bird feeders measure 14" tall X 18" wide.

fields.name: Asterisk - Modern Bird Feeder
fields.description:
The "Asterisk" series of bird feeders measure 15" in diameter X 4" deep.

These pieces are each treated with spray primer and enamel. Although they are pictured here in only select colors, but they can be easily finished in any color you'd prefer.

fields.name: Drop - Modern Bird Feeder
fields.description:
The design for these 'Drop' bird feeders is something I've wanted to realize for a long time. My goal was to design something that was simpler to make yet still interesting looking, so that I could offer it at a lower price. These welded steel feeders are made entirely by hand. They are 12" in height, 6" wide. and 4" deep.

The stainless steel screen, which holds the seed, is welded to two stainless steel rods. These rods fit into grooves at the corners of the piece. The rods hold the seed screen in place much like a hammock, and also serve as perches for birds. The entire screen and rod section is removable for cleaning.

The steel is treated with primer before being sprayed with Rustoleum enamel. They can be finished in a variety of colors if you are interested. Just Google 'Rustoleum spray enamel' for color chart and simply indicate the different color preference when ordering.
fields.size: They are 12" in height, 6" wide. and 4" deep.
